originalText.text: Ants in the pantry can be a real nuisance. The pest control service did an excellent job. They not only got rid of the ants but also gave us tips on preventing future infestations. Very professional!

text.text: Ants in the pantry can be a real nuisance. The pest control service did an excellent job. They not only got rid of the ants but also gave us tips on preventing future infestations. Very professional!

originalText.text: A persistent ant problem in my kitchen was driving me nuts. Thanks to the expert guidance and effective treatment from the pest control team, my kitchen is ant-free. Henry's expertise made all the difference.

text.text: A persistent ant problem in my kitchen was driving me nuts. Thanks to the expert guidance and effective treatment from the pest control team, my kitchen is ant-free. Henry's expertise made all the difference.

originalText.text: Excellent customer service and was very professional when handling my certain situation. I'm not one who enjoys finding any type of bugs in my house, but when I saw one, I immediately called this company. These guys were amazing, they came in and sprayed every corner and edge of my place. They didn't use any harsh chemicals and their products are safe. I was relieved when they squeezed me on their booked schedule for the following day, I just couldn't wait to get it under control before it got out of hand. It was a great experience, and if I ever this type of service again in the future they will be #1 on my list to call.

originalText.text: East Harlem`s Expert Exterminators was one of the best service people I have had to my home. They were on time, knew their trade VERY WELL, could tell they were concerned about us and having success. It was a pleasure dealing with someone that treated you like it was their home and not just some person that had to be there on their way to the next job. . I am now recommending them to everyone. I also loved the fact that they used natural ased prodcuts so that it is safer for my kids family and pets. Thank you

originalText.text: This company is awesome! I had lots of pest issues and these guys are the true experts. I called a couple other companies and no one was as kind and patient as this place. I had lots of mice coming from the buildings dirty basement. This place came and took care of the issue by spraying around and they also got rid of the waterbeds and roaches that were hiding in whole's i had in the kitchen. I would definitely recommend East Harlem's Expert Exterminators to anyone with pest issues. The price was great and the service was outstanding!
